languages.text: "О да! Навигаторы Дома прибыли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} относительно недавно — всего двести восемь лет назад. До того множество веков наши предки во славу Императора расширяли пределы владений Человечества, прокладывая маршруты в самые разные уголки галактики".

traits.locale_text: "О да! Навигаторы Дома прибыли в Простор относительно недавно — всего двести восемь лет назад. До того множество веков наши предки во славу Императора, расширяли пределы владений Человечества, прокладывая маршруты в самые разные уголки галактики".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."
languages.original_text: "О да! Навигаторы Дома прибыли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} относительно недавно — всего двести восемь лет назад. До того множество веков наши предки во славу Императора расширяли пределы владений Человечества, прокладывая маршруты в самые разные уголки галактики".

Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “噢，没错！我们家族的导航者是最近才来到{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的，仅仅是两百零八年之前而已。在此之前，我们的先祖在帝皇荣光的照耀下，拓展了人类帝国的边界，开辟出了无数条新的道路，通往银河系各个角落。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: “噢，没错！我们家族的导航者是最近才来到{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的，仅仅是两百零八年之前而已。在此之前，我们的先祖在帝皇荣光的照耀下，拓展了人类帝国的边界，开辟出了无数条新的道路，通往银河系各个角落。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the Koronus Expanse fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

languages.text: «¡Oh, sí! Los Navegantes de la casa solo llegaron recientemente a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}: hace apenas doscientos ocho años. Antes de eso, nuestros antepasados expandían las fronteras del dominio de la Humanidad para mayor gloria del Emperador, abriendo rutas a los confines de la galaxia».
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, sí! Los Navegantes de la casa solo llegaron recientemente a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}: hace apenas doscientos ocho años. Antes de eso, nuestros antepasados expandían las fronteras del dominio de la Humanidad para mayor gloria del Emperador, abriendo rutas a los confines de la galaxia».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、そうです！一族の航宙士が{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}にやってきたのはごく最近…ほんの208年前のことです。それ以前は、私たちの祖先は皇帝の栄光のために人類の支配領域を広げ、銀河のさまざまな場所に道を切り開いてきました」
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうです！一族の航宙士が{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}にやってきたのはごく最近…ほんの208年前のことです。それ以前は、私たちの祖先は皇帝の栄光のために人類の支配領域を広げ、銀河のさまざまな場所に道を切り開いてきました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh ja! Die Navigatoren des Hauses sind erst vor relativ kurzer Zeit in die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gekommen — vor gerade einmal 208 Jahren. Davor erweiterten unsere Ahnen die Grenzen des Menschenreichs zum Ruhm des Imperators und bereiteten neue Wege in unterschiedlichste Winkel der Galaxie."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja! Die Navigatoren des Hauses sind erst vor relativ kurzer Zeit in die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gekommen — vor gerade einmal 208 Jahren. Davor erweiterten unsere Ahnen die Grenzen des Menschenreichs zum Ruhm des Imperators und bereiteten neue Wege in unterschiedlichste Winkel der Galaxie."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Oh oui ! Les navigateurs de ma maison sont arrivés assez récemment dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, il y a deux cent huit ans exactement. Avant cela, nos ancêtres contribuaient à étendre les frontières de l'humanité pour la gloire de l'Empereur, en traçant des routes aux quatre coins de la galaxie. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: « Oh oui ! Les navigateurs de ma maison sont arrivés assez récemment dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, il y a deux cent huit ans exactement. Avant cela, nos ancêtres contribuaient à étendre les frontières de l'humanité pour la gloire de l'Empereur, en traçant des routes aux quatre coins de la galaxie. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Öyle tabii! Hanemizin Rotacıları, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ne{/g} daha yeni geldi sayılır. İki yüz seksen yıl kadar olmuş işte. Öncesinde atalarımız; İmparator'un şanını yaymak için İnsanlığın hâkimiyet sınırlarını genişletmiş, galaksinin farklı uçlarına rota çizmekte öncülük etmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! The Navigators of the House came to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} fairly recently — a mere two hundred and eight years ago. Before that, our ancestors expanded the borders of Humankind's dominion for the glory of the Emperor, blazing trails to different corners of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle tabii! Hanemizin Rotacıları {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ne daha yeni geldi sayılır... Sadece iki yüz seksen yıl önceydi. Bunun öncesinde atalarımız, İmparator'un şanını yaymak için İnsanlığın hâkimiyet sınırlarını genişletmiş, galaksinin farklı uçlarına rota çizmekte öncülük etmiştir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
